item.description:
We've got the back room at Bar all to ourselves from 7 to 10 with martini specials, free pizza and doorprizes -- all for a donation of $10. Proceeds from this event will go to cancer research, as our very own Sandra is training her butt off for a triathlon to raise money for the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society. (For more info about Sandra's fundraising, click here).

Come out and start your weekend with tasty beverages, free goodies and a warm fuzzy feeling from supporting a great cause. (Ok, maybe you'll owe that warm, fuzzy feeling to the tasty beverages as well.) And don't forget Thursday night is $1 drafts after 10 at Bar, so plan on sticking around to continue the evening in true NHC fashion.

The back room at BAR is huge so feel free to bring as many friends, family members and coworkers as you like!

**UPDATE**You're not gonna want to miss a chance to win all kinds of free stuff! Doorprizes include gift certificates from Barcelona, Caffe Bottega, Nikkita, Miya's Sushi, Kudeta, Pacifico, Koffee Too, Cristy's, and Libby's Pastries as well as T-shirts, free manicure and other goodies.
item.name: Loads of Great Doorprizes at Our Exclusive BAR Party
